name: Generator Barcelona

reviews.text: If you are traveling to Barcelona I highly recommend the Generator Hostel!!!!
reviews.title: the best place to sleep!!!!!!

reviews.text: Just come back from the most amazing three days in Barcelona and felt I had to share my experience with anyone who was looking to do the same.
reviews.title: More than adequate for a stag party...

reviews.text: The hostel was great, the design is wonderfull: nice room , bed and bath room at a great location. You can easily walk to a lot of the hot spots it is close to the metro line.
reviews.title: 'Boutique hostel'
Disgusting and arrogant
reviews.text: The reception staff are extremely friendly, nice and helpfull.The price also is good!!!
I suggest to all my friends this hostel, because you feel like at home!!!!! it's a good place for friends, family..... you can find everything you need!!!! you're in the heart of Barcellona!!!!
reviews.title: It was a surprise!

reviews.text: The staff at this hotel were the friendliest I've ever encountered - thanks to them, I'll def be looking out for Generator Hostels in other cities.
reviews.title: Great value for anyone looking for a sociable atmosphere

reviews.text: Generator is a Hostel, so there's lot of teenagers and other young adults, but plenty of older people too. We were a group of 11 aged 30-35 and had a wonderful time - the bar was good value, open until 2am and always pretty quiet (due to the other guests being fairly young!)
reviews.title: Quirky Gem in the heart of Barcelona city - Perfect!

reviews.text: This hostel was great just a few picky things such as there are no hooks for coats or towels in rooms and there is only 1 elevator which is extremely slow.
reviews.title: Potentially amazing.

reviews.text: It was quiet, the rooms were clean and each bed had its own electric socket and light which was great.
reviews.title: A hostel with the interior design of a fancy hotel. Highly recommend!

reviews.text: We had an inclusive dinner which was truly awful and the breakfast was below average so just don't eat here!
reviews.title: Fancy hostel at a great location

reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but as this is a new hostel I thought it would be helpful. I am a well travelled British guy in my mid-twenties and have stayed everywhere from the worst hostels to the best 5 star hotels around the world, so I feel I can offer a fair review.
reviews.title: An Amazing Holiday!

reviews.text: The location is very good. Just 10min walk to Diagonal metro station and 15min walk to the famous Gaudi church. You can walk to the Ramblas shopping street within 25min or get the metro.
reviews.title: brand spankin new

reviews.text: This hostel is brand new, spotless, and offers comfortable beds with crisp white linens. Staff are friendly (in a chain hotel sort of way) and professional. It has a bar, restaurant and lots of lounge space with flat screen TVs. It feels like any hostel (well, more like a hotel) in London, New York, Washington, Los Angeles, or Tokyo.
reviews.title: Spartan, white, soulless rooms on offer

reviews.text: In other words, there's no charm here. (Indeed, the only reason I spent a night here is because I was unexpectedly booked here for a night due to unforeseen events at my other, much more charming and delightful accommodation.) If you want to come to Barcelona and spend all your time and money in a modern box that lacks any semblance of charm or character, by all means come to this hostel.
reviews.title: Excellent stay, fun place, shops all around

reviews.text: Again, there's nothing wrong with this hostel, really. If you want comfort, stay here. If you want happiness and a unique Barcelona experience, stay far away.
reviews.title: The staff and accommodation are the best ever!!!

reviews.text: This is a new hotel was open 57 days when We stayed there. Took the train from the airport to the Metro, walked up a couple of blocks and there it was. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. The rooms were nice and clean. This place is a hotel and a hostel. Think it's based on the floor your own. Nice hot showers, pool tables, a bar, plenty of lounge areas, free Internet, an agent from Sandeman's free walking tour comes by every morning, comfy white down comforters... What can I say it was a great place and especially for the money, very affordable! Need to bring a lock if your doing the hostel side or can purchase at the front desk for a nominal fee, also have inverters available for purchase.
reviews.title: the best place to sleep in barcelona

reviews.text: What a great and friendly place. Rooms are so clean and the utilities are so up to date. Great decor! Most of all the staff are amazing. A big thank you to Carlos for being so wonderful and really making our stay that much better. Not only him but Irene, David, Gianmarco, beatrice and Christian are just some of the nicest most accommodating people I have ever met. I would stay here again in a heart beat . Highly recommended. Thank you guys, you made my trip to Barcelona so much better!!!
reviews.title: New and Stylish

description: You’ll find Generator Barcelona conveniently located just a 5 minute walk from two main metro stations, Diagonal and Verdaguer. Travelling to and from the hostel to all the must see sights is a piece of cake. The beautiful sandy beaches are just a 15 minute metro journey away, and only a short walk away are the maze of small streets of the Eixample district, home to Barcelona’s trendy shops, bars and restaurants. Generator is the perfect place for those looking to combine style with great atmosphere. You’ll find great beds for sleepy heads, a communal TV room with outdoor patio to a chill out lounge/café that serves the best drinks and snacks for miles around. Choose from a great selection of rooms, from Dorms, to Quads, to Private en-suites with your own power socket and LED light for late night reading. Fast and free Wi-Fi is all yours too. To get the most out of your stay, visit the travel shop and our city experts will help you devise an itinerary that will take you to all the hidden treasures this dynamic city has to offer. Barcelona is the latest edition to the Generator family, We will see you there.
